Notes: See README for more comprehensive documentation.
Valid color options (all lowercase): black; red; green; yellow;
bright black; bright red; bright green; bright yellow;
bright blue; bright magenta; bright cyan; bright gray

Additional colors may be accessible via alternative color codes. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ANSI_escape_code#Colors and README for more info. For example: 38:5:91 may produce a purple color on your screen.
Set to true to show dates before months. Only compatible with v2.2.0 and later releases.
Will override the previous four configuration options if set to true. Only compatible with v2.2.0 and later releases.

Only takes effect if use_custom_format is set to true. Do not include any quotation marks or commas. Reference for custom format codes: https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/chrono/zoned_time/formatter.html Only compatible with v2.2.0 and later releases.
Only compatible with v2.4.0 and later releases.
